## Install software

```shell
brew install viennarna ghostscript

```

Or get from [this](http://rna.tbi.univie.ac.at) and [that](https://web.mit.edu/ghostscript/www/Ps2pdf.htm) pages.

## Then prepare

* a `fasta` file with original sequences.
* a `tsv` file with mutated sites.

###### For example,

```shell
head -2 ./rawseq.fa
#>GET1
#

head -2 ./mut.lst.tsv
#GIM5	219	C	T	92	112	272	292
#GIM5	222	C	A	92	112	272	292
```

After these, run as [WorkFlow](WorkFlow.sh).
